description:
A new way to collaborate

Empowering teams by messenger, meetings, calendar, docs, and emails. It's all in one place.
Base
- When a table approaches your plan's row limit, organization administrators for Feishu Business and Enterprise plans can purchase add-ons. Administrators of a base can then expand row limits for tables as needed.
Meetings
- You can start audio recording in Feishu, which supports AI summary and transcription in Minutes. Then you can easily create new content based on the recording.
